page.title: 20CUSTOMS MARIANGLAS
page.content: Every July just before the School Holidays we have a party in The Old School in Marianglas for everyone in the village, and the parish of Llan- eugrad.The food is provided by the villagers, others donate money for our fancy dress competition and sports held on the village green.In the evening we have a disco. The first party was held in 1969 and we have had an annual party ever since.Nearly everyone in the district turns up. The Old School was built as a British School in 1854, and was converted into a Village Hall.The building has not changed much, a kitchen was added and outside toilets were built.A Committee looks after the Hall and this year all the windows have been replaced. Emma Williams.
